law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 3. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4281e-5, 4281e-10.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Control of form, sale and distribution of stamps by department; allowance to wholesaler for affixing stamps and reporting.
